verses.text: \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w*.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w besieging|strong="H6696"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* imprisoned \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w*, \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w imprisoned|strong="H3920"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, saying: “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w* \w like|strong="H3541"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*? \w You|strong="H5414"\w* claim \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*, ‘\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w capture|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*,\f + \fr 32:4 \ft That is, the Babylonians; also in verses 5, 24, 25, 28, 29, and 43\f* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H6485"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Babylon, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* stay \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w attend|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H6485"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w succeed|strong="H6743"\w*.’”

\w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* replied, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*:

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*! \w Hanamel|strong="H2601"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w coming|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* say, ‘\w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* yourself \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cousin \w Hanamel|strong="H2601"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* urged \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, ‘\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w own|strong="H3425"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H3425"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w*. \w Buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H3045"\w*.’” \w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7069"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w the|strong="H7069"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H2601"\w* cousin \w Hanamel|strong="H2601"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H8254"\w* \w seventeen|strong="H7651"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.\f + \fr 32:9 \ft 17 shekels is approximately 6.8 ounces or 193.8 grams of silver.\f*

I \w signed|strong="H3789"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w the|strong="H3789"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w*, \w called|strong="H5749"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H3789"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w on|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H3789"\w* \w scales|strong="H3976"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w*—\w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* copy \w with|strong="H4736"\w* \w its|strong="H3947"\w* \w terms|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w conditions|strong="H2706"\w*, \w as|strong="H3947"\w* well \w as|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w open|strong="H1540"\w* copy—

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mahseiah|strong="H4271"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* cousin \w Hanamel|strong="H2601"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* signing \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* agreement \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w*.
\w In|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H6680"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w instructed|strong="H6680"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*,

“\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w deeds|strong="H5612"\w*—both \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* copy \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w open|strong="H1540"\w* copy \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w*—\w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w clay|strong="H2789"\w* \w jar|strong="H3627"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* preserve \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*.” Jeremiah Prays for Understanding

After \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w deed|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*:

“Oh, \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w outstretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*. \w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w difficult|strong="H6381"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*!

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thousands \w but|strong="H7999"\w* \w lay|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* fathers \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* laps \f + \fr 32:18 \ft Hebrew into the bosom\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H8034"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w One|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w deed|strong="H5950"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w reward|strong="H6529"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4611"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w performed|strong="H6213"\w* signs \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, both \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* mankind. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w Yourself|strong="H6213"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* case \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w Your|strong="H5186"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* land \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* signs \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*, \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w an|strong="H3318"\w* \w outstretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w terror|strong="H4172"\w*.
